abstract: Tribune Publishing executives inform investors that company has reduce its guidance for year, based on estimate of total revenue as low as $1.64 billion; company had previously dismissed Los Angeles Times publisher Austin Beutner due to conflict over strategy.
lead_paragraph: Tribune Publishing lowered its revenue and earnings guidance for the year, based on a review of its holdings in Southern California. The company recently fired the publisher of The Los Angeles Times.

headline.main: Tribune Publishing Lowers Its Profit Expectations
headline.print_headline: Expectations Are Lowered at Tribune Publishing

snippet: Tribune Publishing lowered its revenue and earnings guidance for the year, based on a review of its holdings in Southern California. The company recently fired the publisher of The Los Angeles Times.
